org.cloudgraph.hbase.mapreduce

Class GraphRecordReader

  • java.lang.Object
      • org.cloudgraph.hbase.mapreduce.GraphRecordReader

  • public class GraphRecordReader
extends
    Iterates over HBase root table data for the current TableSplit, assembling data graphs based on the detailed selection criteria within a given query. Partially or fully assembled data graphs may be passed to a GraphRecordRecognizer and potentially screened from client GraphMapper extensions potentially illuminating business logic dedicated to identifying specific records.

      • nextKeyValue

        public boolean nextKeyValue()
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            java.lang.InterruptedException
        Positions the record reader to the next record.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When reading the record failed.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - When the job was aborted.
        Returns:
        true if there was another record.
        See Also:
        org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.RecordReader#nextKeyValue()

      • getProgress

        public float getProgress()
        The current progress of the record reader through its data.
        Returns:
        A number between 0.0 and 1.0, the fraction of the data read.
        See Also:
        org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.RecordReader#getProgress()
